languages.text: Футфол наводнила новая, особенно агрессивная банда, не знающая страха ни перед Наместником, ни перед Вольными Торговцами. Их бесчинствам нужно положить конец.
A new, particularly aggressive gang has set up shop on Footfall, showing no fear of either the Liege or Rogue Traders. Their thuggish behaviour must be stopped.
languages.original_text: Футфол наводнила новая, особенно агрессивная банда, не знающая страха ни перед Наместником, ни перед Вольными Торговцами. Их бесчинствам нужно положить конец.

traits.locale_text: A new, particularly aggressive gang has set up shop in Footfall, showing no fear of either the Liege or Rogue Traders. Their thuggish behavior must be stopped.
A new, particularly aggressive gang has set up shop in Footfall, showing no fear of either the Liege or Rogue Traders. Their thuggish behavior must be stopped.
A new, particularly aggressive gang has set up shop in Footfall, showing no fear of either the Liege or Rogue Traders. Their thuggish behavior must be stopped.
A new, particularly aggressive gang has set up shop in Footfall, showing no fear of either the Liege or Rogue Traders. Their thuggish behaviour must be stopped.

languages.text: 落脚港出现了一个丧心病狂的新帮派。这群暴徒丝毫不畏惧总督与行商浪人的权威，必须阻止他们的暴行。
languages.original_text: A new, particularly aggressive gang has set up shop on Footfall, showing no fear of either the Liege or Rogue Traders. Their thuggish behaviour must be stopped.

traits.locale_text: 落脚港出现了一个丧心病狂的新帮派。这群暴徒丝毫不畏惧总督与行商浪人的权威，必须阻止他们的暴行。

languages.text: 新興の極めて攻撃的なギャングがフットフォールに店を構え、領主にも自由開拓者にも恐れている様子はまるでない。このギャングの凶暴な振舞いを止めなければならない。
languages.original_text: A new, particularly aggressive gang has set up shop on Footfall, showing no fear of either the Liege or Rogue Traders. Their thuggish behaviour must be stopped.

traits.locale_text: 新興の極めて攻撃的なギャングがフットフォールに店を構え、領主にも自由開拓者にも恐れている様子はまるでない。このギャングの凶暴な振舞いを止めなければならない。

languages.text: Una banda nueva y especialmente agresiva se ha establecido en Paso, y no parece tener ningún miedo al señor ni a los Comerciantes Independientes. Debes poner fin a sus crímenes.
languages.original_text: A new, particularly aggressive gang has set up shop on Footfall, showing no fear of either the Liege or Rogue Traders. Their thuggish behaviour must be stopped.

traits.locale_text: Una banda nueva y especialmente agresiva se ha establecido en Paso, y no parece tener ningún miedo al señor ni a los Comerciantes Independientes. Debes poner fin a sus crímenes.

languages.text: Eine neue, besonders aggressive Bande treibt in Footfall ihr Unwesen und scheint weder den Lehnsherrn noch Freihändler zu fürchten. Ihrem Treiben muss ein Ende gesetzt werden.
languages.original_text: A new, particularly aggressive gang has set up shop on Footfall, showing no fear of either the Liege or Rogue Traders. Their thuggish behaviour must be stopped.

traits.locale_text: Eine neue, besonders aggressive Bande treibt in Footfall ihr Unwesen und scheint weder den Lehnsherrn noch Freihändler zu fürchten. Ihrem Treiben muss ein Ende gesetzt werden.

languages.text: Un nouveau gang particulièrement agressif s'est installé dans Castel et ne semble pas intimidé par le suzerain, ni par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Leurs exactions doivent cesser au plus vite.
languages.original_text: A new, particularly aggressive gang has set up shop on Footfall, showing no fear of either the Liege or Rogue Traders. Their thuggish behaviour must be stopped.

traits.locale_text: Un nouveau gang particulièrement agressif s'est installé dans Castel et ne semble pas intimidé par le suzerain, ni par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Leurs exactions doivent cesser au plus vite.

languages.text: Yeni ve oldukça saldırgan bir çete, Binliman'da dükkân açmış. Ne Emîr'den ne de Hür Tacir'den korkuları var. Haydutluklarına son vermek şart.
languages.original_text: A new, particularly aggressive gang has set up shop on Footfall, showing no fear of either the Liege or Rogue Traders. Their thuggish behaviour must be stopped.

traits.locale_text: Binliman'da yeni, oldukça agresif bir çete dükkân açmış. Ne Emîr'e ne de Hür Tacir'e karşı korku besliyorlar. Bu haydutsu davranışları durdurulmalı.
